assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Jiale Xiang, Xinyi Yan, Jiguang Peng, Xiaomei Xie, Ye Yin, Jian Wang, Huanming Yang, Lijian Zhao, Zhiyu Peng were employed at BGI at the time of submission. Shen worked for a fee-for-service clinical genetic diagnostic laboratory. No other potential conflict of interest relevant to this article was reported.
